text: On 12 September 2023, at around 23:00 ICT (UTC+07:00), a fire broke out in a ten-story microapartment building in Hanoi, Vietnam. This building was in the Khương Đình area of the Thanh Xuân district and was home to about 150 people. The fire killed 56 people, including ten children, and injured 37 others. == References == Category:2023 disasters in Asia Category:2023 fires Category:2020s fires in Asia Category:21st century in Vietnam 2023 building fire Category:September 2023 events
title: 2023 Hanoi building fire
